com.quinsoft.zeidon

Interface ObjectEngine

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JavaObjectEngine, ObjectEngineForwarder

    public interface ObjectEngine
    This is the main container of all Zeidon objects. User applications generally use it just to create Tasks. The standard implementation of the ObjectEngine is JavaObjectEngine.

    • Field Summary

      Fields

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        String getId()
        A string representation of an ID that is (virtually) guaranteed to be globally unique.
        Returns:
        unique ID.

      • getApplicationList

        List<? extends Application> getApplicationList()
        Returns the list of all known applications. The list of known applications is found by searching through the classpath and opening all zeidon.app resources that are found.
        Returns:
        the list of known applications.

      • getApplication

                    throws UnknownApplicationException

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Application object.
        Throws:
        UnknownApplicationException

        Returns:

      • createTask

        Task createTask(String applicationName,
                boolean persistent)
         throws UnknownApplicationException
        Creates a Zeidon task. If persistent = true then the Object Engine will keep a persistent reference to the task. This means that task.dropTask() *must* be called for it to be released. A non-persistent task will be automatically cleaned up once there are no more application references to the task.
        Parameters:
        applicationName -
        persistent -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        UnknownApplicationException

      • createTask

        Task createTask(String applicationName,
                boolean persistent,
                String taskId)
         throws UnknownApplicationException
        Create a Zeidon task and assigning it the specified taskId.
        Parameters:
        applicationName -
        taskId -
        persistent -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        UnknownApplicationException

      • getSystemTask

        Task getSystemTask()
        Returns:
        the Zeidon System task that is registered when the Object Engine is instantiated.

      • getTaskById

        Task getTaskById(String id)
        Looks for a task with a matching ID.
        Parameters:
        id - Task ID.
        Returns:
        Task or null if ID is not found.

      • getTaskList

        List<? extends Task> getTaskList()
        Return the list of current tasks sorted by task ID. Note that holding on to this list could prevent non-persistent tasks from being garbage-collected.
        Returns:
        list of current tasks.

      • getHomeDirectory

        String getHomeDirectory()
        Returns:
        ZEIDON_HOME directory.

      • getVersion

        String getVersion()
        Returns:
        the current version of the OE.

      • getClassLoader

        ClassLoader getClassLoader(String className)
        Used to dynamically load classes.
        Parameters:
        className - Name of class that will be loaded. Usually ignored.
        Returns:

      • getDomainClassLoader

        DomainClassLoader getDomainClassLoader()
        Returns:
        returns the class loader for domains. TODO: It would be nice if this could be injected directly into the objects that use it instead of getting it from the OE.

      • startBrowser

        boolean startBrowser()
        Start the Object Browser.
        Returns:
        true if started, false if there was an exception.
